sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./CreativeTemplate.css"; const CreativeTemplate = ({ resumeData, isPreview }) => { if (isPreview) { return (

John Doe

john@example.com

Skills

JavaScript
React
Node.js

Experience

Senior Developer at Tech Corp

Education

B.S. in Computer Science

); } return (

{resumeData.personalInfo.fullName}

{resumeData.personalInfo.title}

{resumeData.contact.email}
{resumeData.contact.phone &&
{resumeData.contact.phone}
} {resumeData.contact.location && (
{resumeData.contact.location}
)} {resumeData.contact.linkedin && (
LinkedIn
)}
{resumeData.skills.length > 0 && (

Skills

{resumeData.skills.map((skill, index) => (
{skill}
))}
)} {resumeData.languages?.length > 0 && (

Languages

{resumeData.languages.map((lang, index) => (
{lang.language} {lang.proficiency}
))}
)}
{resumeData.professionalSummary && (

Professional Summary

{resumeData.professionalSummary}

)} {resumeData.workExperience.length > 0 && (

Experience

{resumeData.workExperience.map((exp, index) => (

{exp.position}

{exp.company}

{exp.duration}

{exp.responsibilities}

))}
)} {resumeData.education.length > 0 && (

Education

{resumeData.education.map((edu, index) => (

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution}

{edu.year} {edu.gpa && ` | GPA: ${edu.gpa}`}

))}
)} {resumeData.certifications?.length > 0 && (

Certifications

{resumeData.certifications.map((cert, index) => (

{cert.name}

{cert.organization} | {cert.year}

))}
)} {resumeData.projects?.length > 0 && (

Notable Projects

{resumeData.projects.map((project, index) => (

{project.name}

{project.description}

Technologies: {project.technologies}

))}
)} {resumeData.awards?.length > 0 && (

Awards & Achievements

{resumeData.awards.map((award, index) => (

{award.name}

{award.organization} | {award.year}

))}
)}

â˜‘ I hereby declare that all the information given above is true and correct to the best of my knowledge

); }; export default CreativeTemplate;
